attributes.release_summary:
# Changelog

## 6.5.0

- Update base image to Debian 12 (bookworm)
- Update mosquitto to version 2.0.20
- Update mosquitto-go-auth to version 2.1.0
- Update libwebsockets to version 4.3.3

## 6.4.1

- Increase default max_queued_messages to 8192 to fix dr
attributes.title: Mosquitto broker

attributes.release_summary:
## 2.0.0-2

- Fix addon crashing on serialport open on certain systems (e.g. Rpi4) [#25464](https://github.com/Koenkk/zigbee2mqtt/issues/25464)

## 2.0.0-1

- Updated Zigbee2MQTT to version [`2.0.0`](https://github.com/Koenkk/zigbee2mqtt/releases/tag/2.0.
attributes.title: Zigbee2MQTT
